Executive, Eric Schmidt , has said that he intends to expand his Web firm's business in China. Eric Schmidt also hopes to find a Chinese partner for Google's Android mobile phone operating system. I have always been the person who believes the most in expanding into China, the BBC quoted Eric Schmidt , as saying.
